TopicTitle: KSP is extremely slow to load.

Articles.Content: KSP is extremely slow to load for me. This issue started after I had to force shutdown my computer due to it getting stuck on the restart screen. The computer operated fine after being turned on, and I shut it down for the night, and in the morning, I turned it on and booted up KSP, and then KSP took minutes to load each file. I don't know what is causing this, and I didn't have the time to wait for it to load. The only mods I have are restock and restock plus.
